channel.title: Performance on Oliver Lehner
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Oliver Lehner

item.title: Through the Far-see-er VR
item.description: I contributed a small VR part to Sam Bunn’s spectacular utopian Performance/Installation “Through the Far-see-er”. It is available here but recent changes to motion sensor API could mean your mobile device will not be able to display it correctly. (At the time of this writing, it worked on Firefox v67.0 for Android).
